items.text: The digital brand standards established for Mercer are applied to all product suites through a style tile. A style tile allows for a visual alignment between approved brand assets and Evolution patterns.
Evolution patterns that are familiar to the user can be branded for a specific product type. Each pattern is designed for reusability and consistency across all Mercer products.
With a full build environment easily available, components can be quickly added to any product suite. Through style tile integration, each component cab be accurately branded.

items.title: Visual Style
items.text: Evolution components are a collection of patterns; each capable of complementing a visual style.

items.title: Creative Flexibility
items.text: Approved visual assets for designers provide creative flexibility, while still guaranteeing brand accuracy.

items.title: Style Tiles
items.text: Through the use of style tiles, the visual aesthetics of product suite components remain consistent.
Style tiles establish a visual identity for a product or product suite without the complications of producing high fidelity screens that encompass every detail.
Evolution patterns have the level of detail required for a quick build of any product; style tiles simply apply the brand to the function.
Without the complications of producing multiple high fildelty screens, the use of style tiles allows front-end developers to receive visual assets quicker.
